name: BayAgro
description: BayAgro objedinjuje sve  omoguuje vam pristup svim informacijama, ali i novostima vezanim za nae proizvode, daje pregled naih planiranih dogaaja, a nai servisi Bayer Voarski Dnevnik i Bayer Vinogradar vam postaju jo dostupniji. Nova aplikacija sadri i potpuno novi servis  Bayer ratarska patrola  koja sadri najnovije i najsvjeije informacije o stanju na terenu vezano za ratarske kulture.  Preuzmite aplikaciju jos danas i budite informirani u svako doba dana. BayAgro combines everything - allowing you access to all the information and news related to our products, giving an overview of our planned events, and our services Bayer Voarski Dnevnik and Bayer Vinogradar are becoming even more accessible to you. The new application also includes a brand new service - the Bayer Patrol Patrol - containing the latest and latest information on field conditions related to crops. Download the application today and be informed at any time of the day.
